participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly. Enjoys artistic activities and has a laid-back approach to life.
participant_1.background: My favorite color is blue. I paint with watercolors. I hate cleaning. I'm Italian American. I work in finance.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and ambitious. Passionate about sports and culture, with a desire to explore the world.
participant_2.background: I am a huge Buffalo Bills fan, and our family has season tickets. I'd also like to study abroad in Spain. I am currently studying at Union College and want to be an English teacher. That way, after graduating, I can teach English there for a year or two. I grew up in Syracuse, NY with my parents and brother.

content.text: Oh, no way! I grew up in Syracuse too!
That's so cool! What's your favorite thing about Syracuse?
I love the food! There are so many great restaurants there.
Me too! I love going to the Salt City Market.
I love the Salt City Market too! I've always wanted to take a cooking class there.
I've never taken a cooking class there, but I've heard they're great.
I'm sure they are! I'm definitely going to take one someday.
What else do you like to do in Syracuse?
I love going to the museums and the zoo.
Me too! The museums are so cool. I love the Erie Canal Museum.
I love the Erie Canal Museum too! I also love the Rosamond Gifford Zoo.
The Rosamond Gifford Zoo is amazing! I love seeing all the animals.
Me too! I love the elephants.
I'm so glad to meet someone else from Syracuse!
Me too! It's nice to know there are other people from Syracuse who love the city as much as I do.
